Name: Agenda ViewDefinition
Description: This example demonstrates how to implement an Agenda ViewDefinition for RadScheduleView using RadListBox.
KeyWords: Agenda ViewDefinition,  dayviewdefinition, custom, listbox, appointments

Name: Appointment Color Based On Resource
Description: This example demonstrates how you can apply different color for the same appointment according to the assigned resources.
KeyWords: Appointment Color Based On Resource,  appointmentitemcontenttemplate, converter, appointmenttemplate

Name: Appointments Reminders
Description: This example demonstrates how to implement reminders for the appointments in RadScheduleView for Silverlight and WPF.
KeyWords: Appointments Reminders,  appointmentitemcontenttemplate, editappointmentdialogstyle, appointmenttemplate, snooze, dismiss

Name: Avoid Overlapping Appointments
Description: This example demonstrates how you could prevent overlapping appointments when drag-and-drop or resize an appointment. In order to achieve it you should create a custom DragDropBehavior and check in CanDrop and CanResize methods whether the destination slot contains any appointments. Additionally, you should customize the RecurrenceChoiceDragDropDialog to handle the case when a whole series of a recurrent appointment is dragged.
KeyWords: Avoid Overlapping Appointments,  dragdropbehavior, conflictchecking, recurrencechoicedragdropdialogstyle, recurrencechoiceresizedialogstyle, recurrent

Name: Change ResizeCursor During Resize
Description: This example demonstrates how to easily change the resize cursor of RadScheduleView while resizing an appointment. Start resizing an appointment and notice how the cursor changes when resizing is not possible.

Name: Custom CurrentTimeIndicator Style
Description: This example demonstrates how you could easily customize the appearance of the CurrentTimeIndicator of RadScheduleView using the CurrentTimeIndicatorStyle and CurrentTimeIndicatorAppointmentsAreaStyle properties.

Name: Custom DragDropBehavior
Description:
This example shows how to implement and use a custom ScheduleViewDragDropBehavior. The functionality of example is explained below and demonstrates the use of all the methods available for overriding:
-	Drag and drop between ScheduleView and ListBox
-	Custom Appointment with IsReadOnly property which cannot be moved or resized and has different Background color (Red in the example)
-	The Appointments cannot be resized to a duration below 30 minutes and above 2 hours
-	All of the non ReadOnly Appointments in with same Resource should move together when single Appointment is dragged
-	Appointments cannot be moved from one Resource to another
-	Dragging Appointment with Control key pressed doesn't copy the Appointment
KeyWords: Custom DragDropBehavior,  scheduleviewdragdropbehavior, listbox, move, resize, readonly, appointments

Name: Custom ReadOnlyBehavior
Description: This example demonstrates how to implement custom readonly behavior with custom appointments in a RadScheduleView. Each appoitment has properties indicating whether it can be dragged, edited, resized etc.

Name: Custom Time Ruler Lines Timeline View

ExampleInfo.Name: Custom Time Ruler Lines Timeline View

Description: The example shows how to customize the TimeRulerItemsSyleSelector of the ScheduleView in order to apply different Styles to the TimeRulerLines. This is used, for example, to distinguish the weeks in TimelineViewDefinition.
KeyWords: Custom Time Ruler Lines Timeline View,  timeruleritemssyleselector, distinguish, weeks

Name: Cut Copy Paste Appointments
Description: This example demonstrates how to cut, copy and paste appointments with the keyboard combinations (Ctrl+X, Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V) as well as with a ContextMenu.
KeyWords: Cut Copy Paste Appointments,  keyboard, contextmenu

Name: Binding to Database
Description:
This example demonstrates how to bind the RadScheduleView to a database. For more details on the approach, please refer to the following documentation:
http://www.telerik.com/help/silverlight/radscheduleview-populating-with-data-binding-to-db-overview.html

You can find a VB version of the project at the following link:
https://github.com/telerik/xaml-sdk/tree/master/ScheduleView/Database/SL_VB
KeyWords: Binding to Database,  entityframework, wcf, riaservices, sqlserver

Name: Exporting
Description: This example demonstrates how you can use the ExportExtensions class (part of the Telerik.Windows.Controls assembly) in order to export the ScheduleView to an image or a XPS file ready for printing.

Name: Grouping And Filtering With Tree View

ExampleInfo.Name: Grouping And Filtering With Tree View

Description: This example demonstrates grouping and filtering with TreeView control.
KeyWords: Grouping And Filtering With Tree View

Name: Grouping By TimeMarker
Description: This example demonstrates how to group the appointments of RadScheduleView by their TimeMarker.

Name: Hierarchical Grouping And Filtering With TreeView

ExampleInfo.Name: Hierarchical Grouping And Filtering With TreeView

Description: This example demonstrates hierarchical grouping and filtering using TreeView control.
KeyWords: Hierarchical Grouping And Filtering With TreeView

Name: Month Tick Provider
Description: This example demonstrates how to customize the GroupTickLength property of the TimelineViewDefinition of the ScheduleView in order to make it look like YearView.
KeyWords: Month Tick Provider,  timelineviewdefinition, groupticklength, yearview

Name: MonthView initially expanded
Description: This example demonstrates how to make the MonthView to be expanded by default when the control loads for Silverlight and WPF.

Name: Remove Delete Button
Description: This example demonstrates how to remove the Delete button from the Appointmnets in ScheduleView for Silverlight and WPF.

Name: Resources Paging
Description: This example demonstrates how to implement resources paging in RadScheduleView in the cases when there are too many resources.

Name: Setting SelectedAppointments
Description: This example demonstrates how to easily set the initial SelectedAppointments property to a collection of Appointments using an attached property.

Name: Slots And Appointments Navigation
Description: This example demonstrates how to implement navigation through the Appointments and Slots in the VisibleRange of the ScheduleView for Silverlight and WPF.

Name: SpecialSlots ToolTip
Description: This project demonstrates a way to set a ToolTip on a SpecialSlot.

Name: SpecialSlots ZIndex
Description:
This example illustrates how you can choose which special slot to stay on top of the other by setting its ZIndex.
There is a possible approach the ZIndex to be bound in order to be manipulated from the ViewModel.
The button changes the ZIndex of the ReadOnlySlot in DayView, WeekView and Timeline.
The ZIndex of the NonWorkingHourSlots is bound to the ViewModel statically for MonthView.

Name: Today ViewDefinition
Description: This example demonstrates how to create a custom ViewDefinition for the RadScheduleView control in order to create one that will dispaly only the current (today) day for Silverlight and WPF.
